name: workflowy-inbox
title: Workflowy Inbox
description: Quickly add items to your Workflowy inbox. (This is an independent extension and is not created by Workflowy.)
author: cameron_pak

commands.name: index
commands.title: Send to Workflowy Inbox
commands.description:
Send a note, task, or link to your Workflowy inbox with ease.

Get your API Key at https://workflowy.com/api-key/.

preferences.label: API Key
preferences.description: Get your Workflowy API key at https://workflowy.com/api-key/
preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Workflowy API Key

preferences.label: Save Location URL
preferences.description: Identify the bullet you want to be your inbox bullet and copy the internal link
preferences.name: saveLocationUrl
preferences.title: Workflowy Save Location URL
preferences.placeholder: Enter your Workflowy save location URL

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
